name: DrawerBackdrop
description:
An overlay displayed beneath the popup.
Renders a `<div>` element.

forceRender.description: Whether the backdrop is forced to render even when nested.

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

style.detailedType:
| React.CSSProperties
| ((
    state: Drawer.Backdrop.State,
  ) => CSSProperties | undefined)
| undefined

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.
render.detailedType:
| ReactElement
| ((
    props: HTMLProps,
    state: Drawer.Backdrop.State,
  ) => ReactElement)

data-open.description: Present when the drawer is open.

data-closed.description: Present when the drawer is closed.

data-starting-style.description: Present when the drawer is animating in.

data-ending-style.description: Present when the drawer is animating out.

--drawer-swipe-progress.description: The swipe progress of the drawer gesture.
